ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 260
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Havent tried this, but it doesnt sound dumb to me. Other things, like apply poison need you to sit down to do it, so it could be a parametre here as well.
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 1
> Date: Tue, 11 Apr 2000 13:54:57 -0400
> From: "Drake, Robert, CTR, AFPCA/OPAA"
> <robert.drake@...>
> Subject: A sitting Tinkerer
>
> Sort of a perhaps, maybe, I dunno, but could be a
> dumb question. =) Has
> anyone else noticed if they get faster skill
> advances when they are sitting?
> I sure seem to. I sit, put my items in my toolbox
> and combine. I haven't
> done any scientific research, it's just my
> perception and wonder if anyone
> else has had the same luck. And no, I haven't
> turned clockwise three times
> and point north prior to sitting down yet, but maybe
> I'll give that a shot,
> too. =)
>
> Kilkin
>
>

Havent tried this, but it doesnt sound dumb to me.
Other things, like apply poison need you to sit down
to do it, so it could be a parametre here as well.
Something for the research team...

Piip Ignatz
Iceni
on Innoruuk
